Diagram Patterns

C4 Model

Context, Container, Component, and Code diagrams

Use case: System architecture documentation

UML

Unified Modeling Language diagrams

Use case: Software design and documentation

Archimate

Enterprise architecture modeling

Use case: Enterprise architecture documentation

Mermaid

Text-based diagram generation

Use case: Quick documentation and markdown

Tutorials

Getting Started with Architecture Diagrams

Learn the basics of creating effective architecture diagrams

  • Understand your audience
  • Choose the right level of detail
  • Use consistent notation
  • Keep it simple and clear

Best Practices

Follow these guidelines for professional diagrams

  • Use standard notation where possible
  • Include legends and explanations
  • Version control your diagrams
  • Keep diagrams up to date

Common Mistakes to Avoid

Learn from common pitfalls

  • Too much detail in one diagram
  • Inconsistent notation
  • Missing context or boundaries
  • Outdated diagrams

Export Formats

Architecture diagrams can be exported in multiple formats for different use cases:

PNG
SVG
PDF
Markdown
JSON
PlantUML
Mermaid
OpenAPI
